name: NOWAI
description: NOWAI was launched on February 9th, 2023 by a team of AI experts and Blockchain enthusiasts with the goal of awakening people's creativity through AI generative products with a smooth user experience. NOWAI is determined to be at the forefront of the AI revolution and to bring AI innovations to the end user in the simplest and most intuitive way, so everyone can enjoy this great technological advancement humankind is experiencing. Our current flagship product "WAI" is an AI bot on telegram, discord, web, and other platforms that allows the user to generate images, voices, videos, and more all with the power of AI. Holding a certain amount of the NOWAI token you gain early access to new features and products, as well as to a private community of NOWAI supporters. Staking $NOWAI allows you to participate in our revenue-sharing model and enjoy a share of our success. NOWAI combines the best of Blockchain and AI to bring the latest technological advancements to the masses in a decentralized and simple way. Just generate, NOWAI is that simple
